name: Spring
description: Once per turn: You can choose any number of your unused Main Monster Zones, and if you do, place that number of Season Counters on this card, also those zones cannot be used while this card is on the field. Monsters you control gain 400 ATK for each Season Counter on this card. Once per turn, during your opponent's End Phase: You can take 1 Field Spell from your Deck that you can place a Season Counter on, and place it face-up on your field (but neither player can activate its effects this turn), and if you do, place all Season Counters on this card on that card.
